spec_data.Name: yum-plugin-fs-snapshot
spec_data.Description:
When this plugin is installed it will automatically snapshot any
filesystem that is touched by the packages in a yum update or yum remove.
spec_data.warning: /home/jason/fctl/swap/3/yum-plugin-fs-snapshot-1.1.31-29.el7.noarch.rpm: Header V3 RSA/SHA256 Signature, key ID fd431d51: NOKEY

spec_data.Summary: Yum plugin to automatically snapshot your filesystems during updates
